title: Green gusts of wind atop Empire State

lead: Windfarms will occupy sea footprint the size of London and power 3.4 million homes

lead: Recoverable resources are estimated at between seven and 11 million standard cubic metres of oil equivalent

lead: The acquisition is expected to more than double Drax’s biomass production capacity

title: Businesses granted £40m to slash emissions and energy bills
